Reviews.Title: Pretty dang good
Reviews.Author: Jon Garcia
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for months for a good deal on this camera and finally decided to purchase this bundle. I really wanted it for the camera, lens and memory card. While the tripod is a joke the other items work great. I am very pleased with the purchase and the seller. The item was shipped extremely fast and have had no issues.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor
DIGIC 5 Image Processor
3.0" Vari-Angle Touch Screen LCD
ISO 100-12800, Expandable to 25600
Full HD 1080p Video with Continuous AF
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i DSLR Camera with EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens 32GB Package 6
